channel.title: Jobs in Company Secretary, Legal, Finance & HR Advisory
channel.description: Right candidates for the right jobs

item.title: Single MCQ
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.content:encoded:
[aw2.get token set='module.mrq_single_id' /]
[template.get activity.set shuffle=true o.set='template.activity.set' /]
[template.get activity.question do_shortcode=true /]
[loop.@activity template.activity.set] [/loop.@activity]
[aw2.get activity.hint do_shortcode=true /]

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:
[cf_elements.html-block question label="Question*" /] [cf_elements.html-block set.1.option label="Option 1* " /] [cf_elements.title.m set.1.mark label="Mark for option 1" required="no" /] [cf_elements.html-block set.2.option label="Option 2*" /] [cf_elements.title.m set.2.mark label="Mark for option 2" required="no"/] [cf_elements.html-block set.3.option label="Option 3" required="no" /] [cf_elements.title.m set.3.mark label="Mark for option 3" required="no" /] [cf_elements.html-block set.4.option label="Option 4" required="no" /] [cf_elements.title.m set.4.mark label="Mark for option 4" required="no" /] [cf_elements.html-block set.5.option label="Option 5" required="no" /] [cf_elements.title.m set.5.mark label="Mark for option 5" required="no" /] [cf_elements.html-block set.6.option label="Option 6" required="no" /] [cf_elements.title.m set.6.mark label="Mark for option 6" required="no" /] [cf_elements.html-block set.7.option label="Option 7" required="no" /] [cf_elements.title.m set.7.mark label="Mark for option 7" required="no" /] [cf_elements.html-block set.8.option label="Option 8" required="no" /] [cf_elements.title.m set.8.mark label="Mark for option 8" required="no" /]
